name: Zakk in Hell
description:
Enjoy this retro puzzle-platformer! It's kind of similar to "Lode Runner", but you've got a shotgun. 

KEYBOARD

ACTION:  X 

UP: UP ARROW // DOWN: DOWN ARROW //  LEFT: LEFT ARROW //RIGHT: RIGHT ARROW:

ZAKK CANNOT JUMP, ONLY IN VERY SPECIFIC OCCASIONS. 

(You can also play it on mobile! A virtual joypad will appear)

Programming by Eric "Neuman"

Game Design by Eric "Neuman" and Henry F. Cobbler

Level Design by Eric "Neuman" and Henry F. Cobbler

The game was built  with Vanilla Javascript (Pure javascript and an html5 canvas)

IF you like it, please leave a comment or donate to support us! Would you like to see this game with more levels and some power-ups on STEAM?
